name: Willow Of Gila
description:
You've just planted your spirit tree, "The Willow of Gila", and the local demon epidemic doesn't take kindly to your magical antics.

Grow and defend your tree by planting shrubs that will spawn food for your crops and the tree itself. 

Features:

  • Plant Level-Up Shrubs to grow and empower your tree and crops
  • Plant Health-Fruit crops to sustain yourself
  • Defend yourself, your crops and the tree from oncoming waves of demon imps
  • Choose from Short Sword or a large claymore. One is quick and light, the other is heavy and powerful.
  • Cultivate land with the shovel to plant seeds, and water your crops with the bucket at the river.
  • The enemies won't stop! Keep going to see how far you can make it!

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Mouse: Use Left hand item
  • Right Mouse: Use Right hand item
  • Q: Pick Up with Left hand
  • E: Pick Up with Right hand
  • Shift: Sprint
  • Space: Dodge-Roll

Hints:

  • Sprinting, Dodging and attacking will use up your stamina. Stamina will recharge after not using it for a short period.
  • Crops cannot level up unless they are at full HP. Water the crops to heal them.
  • The higher level your crops, the higher their Max HP and the quicker they will produce.

Notes:

  • This game was built during a two-week period for the  GameJam: MyFirstGameJam
  • Currently there is no sound
